comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Daughter of publisher George Platt Brett (Macmillan Publishing); her engagement to James Polk McKinney Jr. was announced in November 1914, and the wedding was reported in June 1915. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Platt_Brett,_Sr.
